title: Constellation Battles
description: Dante Mooniker teams up with Princess Starra and Old Man Bobi-1 to travel across the universe and stop Dark Star from gathering all the galaxy crystals.
quote: These galaxy crystals possess immense power. Do not let them fall into the wrong hands.
altHero: Dante Mooniker, Princess Starra, and Old Man Bobi-1 escaping in a space ship
alt2: Yola holding up a purple crystal
alt3: Dark Star holding three brightly colored crystals
alt4: Dante Mooniker lifts up his hair to reveal a green crystal on his forehead
